pkgmetadata.longdescription: Local Haplotype Clustering and Visualization // A local haplotyping visualization toolbox to capture major patterns of co-inheritance between clusters of linked variants, whilst connecting findings to phenotypic and demographic traits across individuals. 'crosshap' enables users to explore and understand genomic variation across a trait-associated region. For an example of successful local haplotype analysis, see Marsh et al. (2022) doi:10.1007/s00122-022-04045-8.
